column1: Although the Plaintiff did not claim in his evidence-in-chief that he was misled or cheated
by the Defendant and although an issue in this regard had not been raised, he was asked
during  cross  examination  whether  he  was  cheated  to  which  he  answered
affirmative. The Plaintiff did not however elaborate on how he was cheated nor did he
refer to any representation that the Defendant made that induced him to sign V1. This
answer  of  the  Plaintiff  was  not  pursued  any  further  in  re-examination  and  the  matter
